name: mushroom zombies (7drl 2k19)
description:
7drl 2k19 entry.

set out without a major goal in mind, other than i wanted to do it. i dunno how much i did, in strictly true terms. i think i could do better if i was not playing tetris literally all week, but i also don't hate the result, which means i think it's pretty okay? it's not challenging. there's just some rooms. some zombie boys. some ghosts. my standard stuff, i think. like. can you name a game i've made without mushrooms, zombies, and ghosts? i can't.

shout out to nico deploybits for the extra loading screen jokes. they are all bangers.
